tool_description: Calculates reading speed metrics including words per minute, pages per hour, and personalized speed estimates based on historical data.

book_genre.description: Genre of the book for genre-specific speed calculation

time_period_days.description: Number of recent days to include in speed calculation

exclude_outliers.description: Whether to exclude outlier reading sessions from calculation

error_messages: Invalid user_id: User identifier cannot be empty
Invalid time_period_days: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 365
Insufficient data: Not enough reading sessions found for reliable speed estimation
Invalid book_genre: Genre must be a non-empty string if provided
usage: Provide user_id to estimate reading speed. Optionally specify book_genre, time_period_days, and exclude_outliers to refine the calculation.

average_pages_per_hour.description: Average number of pages read per hour

estimated_words_per_minute.description: Estimated reading speed in words per minute

reading_efficiency.description: Reading efficiency rating (slow, average, fast, very fast)

sessions_analyzed.description: Number of reading sessions used in calculation

speed_trend.description: Whether reading speed is improving, declining, or stable
